cards.name: Biting Frost
cards.strength: Sets the strength of all melee units to 1 for both players

cards.name: Impenetrable Fog
cards.strength: Sets the strength of all ranged units to 1 for both players

cards.name: Torrential Rain
cards.strength: Sets the strength of all siege units to 1 for both players

cards.name: Clear Weather
cards.strength: Eliminates all weather effects from the board.

cards.name: Decoy
cards.strength: Swap with a card on the battlefield to return it to your hand.

cards.name: Scorch
cards.strength: Destroy all cards on the board with 7 strength or more.
